oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This research (1 project) proposes to clarify in an economic point of view, the stake of the management of the quality for the two cereals and milk supply chains.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio I: Food systems. Runs 2001 - 2003. Programme Leader(s): Roque, Olivier.
